extendedInfo.description: Fishhound Mobile is the ultimate mobile application for anglers. Itâs the one application that gives you the functionality that typically requires two or three different apps. Fishhoundâs Mobile Application gives you: The Best Local Fishing ReportsInteractive Maps & GPS PointsSearch for the Best Waters Around YouPersonal Catch LogSearch for a ProFishhound's Species DatabaseThe Ultimate Fly & Lure Database  Imagine youâre on the road and your schedule has opened up. Youâve got a day to fish. You will need to know not only the closest water but also where you can catch the most fish. Using your zip code, Fishhound Mobile finds the fishing reports for the surrounding waters so you know the waters found to be the best by our professional anglers that are closest to your location. It saves you gas and better yet it saves you time. You're out on the water for the perfect day of fishing. On your first cast, you hook the perfect fish, it's your personal best and before you release it or put it in the livewell, what do you do? You take a picture. And now with Fishhound Mobile you can store that photo and information on that perfect fish in your Personal Catch Log.  Youâll remember your location and what you used. Fishhound Mobile is everything an angler needs, no matter where they are!

reviews.title: Not happy
reviews.comment: App doesn\'t work for galaxy. When searching waters doesnt produce any results. Won\'t let me remove lakes. Pls fix!!!!!!
reviews.author: Samuel Bass

reviews.title: Waste of time
reviews.comment: Spend too much time on passwords registering. They won\'t let you use the site
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Sucks
reviews.comment: Maybe the people who made this app should try fishing instead of looking stuff up on the internet if you want a decent fishing app try the one from north American fishing club
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Love this app the fish database is awesome would the best if it would have more fishing spots then the obvious ones but still great app
reviews.author: Bradd Maloney

reviews.title: Horrible app!
reviews.comment: I love the website and all the amazing deals there I\'m a two time member but this app is worthless! Need to update local waters or add an option to add ur own water location. How are us members suppose to update anything if u don\'t let us choose our own waters. I mean really a child could have made a better app!!
reviews.author: Douglas Woodward

reviews.comment: Why have categories for flies if there aren\'t any illustrated. Looked for carp flies and there were none listed. App needs major update to be good.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Almost
reviews.comment: Has some good features but lacks.  Google maps does not work properly for loading lcayion on a catch.  For those who complain about the lack of reports, realize that its user driven so upload some yourselves.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Boo
reviews.comment: Had app with my old iPhone and it was great but on the android the best parts of app does not work like best waters and dashboard waters
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Pathetic
reviews.comment: This is a joke, nothing is listed near me at all. I live in the mountains of North Carolina we have some of the best trout waters in the world and no listings.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very upsetl
reviews.comment: I went the Toyota Big Bass Clasic last year and the leader board was powered by Fishound.  BIg deal. This app wont pull up Google Maps. Who cares about the fly thingy
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Maps doesnt work
reviews.comment: To upload my catches map doesnt work as a paying fishhound member i was hoping for more please fix for a 5 star rating
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Really good app.pitty its only for US and Canada.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Fishingbuddy
reviews.comment: How do you view public catches I have my catches posted for public so how do I view other anglers catch.... other than that this app is awesome and I don\'t know why anyone is complaining at all... get a better device instead of your cheapo phone and maybe it will work... it works just fine on my iPhone and my Samsung galaxy tablet
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No thanks.
reviews.comment: You have to create an account and login just to open the app.  UNINSTALLED
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: BOO!!!
reviews.comment: This app sucks!  I live in Minnesota (the land of 10000 lakes) and there are only about 5 lakes and a couple of rivers on this that you can see reports for! I mean really, I understand this is a free app but I was very disappointed.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Completely USA centric. Absolutely no use for an angler from any other country. Won\'t even let me use most functions
reviews.author: anne Clark

reviews.title: Meh
reviews.comment: I live on the Atlantic ocean in Florida and the closest report is for a river 20 miles away. If I lived in the middle of nowhere I could understand, but this is stupid.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Aceair2
reviews.comment: wish it had option to add Lakes and then that are not in the list.
reviews.author: Steven Mcgillivray

reviews.title: Much improvement necessary
reviews.comment: When uploading pic: Location finder does not work. Cannot enter a date in which fish was caught.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Missing 2 major waters n roanoke va
reviews.comment: Looks good but almost useless for my area. Smith mtn lake & the roanoke river, the 2 major bodies here, are missing from any list
reviews.author: A Google User
